attributes.action: force the energy suppliers to reduce their exorbitant gas & electicity prices even if they are based abroad, after all the oil price has reduced significantly and they used the price of oil to put the prices up very quickly!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should the government have to give pensioners more money to keep warm when the energy companies are making big fat profits? I say bring back the control of energy suppliers to the UK !
The energy suppliers are taking this government for a ride !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
